features: Chafing relief designed to both protect & soothe skin

Cream format applies easily and dries to a powder with no greasy residue
Ideal for use in sensitive areas and to provide relief to already chafed skin
Apply as needed before, during, or after exercise or activity to minimize and relieve chafing

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Apply as needed before, during, or after exercise or activity to minimize and relieve chafing Cream format applies easily and dries to a powder with no greasy residue to provide an effective protective barrier against chafing. Natural ingredients including Calendula work to soothe skin & support healing of chafed skin. Cream format allows for use in sensitive areas and on irritated skin where a roll-on or stick format is less conducive.

Oz. 3 oz. Natural relief of stiffness, pains in limbs, joints and legs, and cramps in calves, feet and legs. Natural relief of pain and cramps in lower body, legs, feet and toes with accompanying occasional sleeplessness and disrupted sleep. Provides daily supply of each cell salt to bring balance to overall cell function. Natural relief of bruising, swelling, stiffness, pain and muscle soreness due to injuries, trauma or overexertion. New - Fast and effective relief of dry, itchy, irritated ears. New - Cream to Powder Formula. Chafing relief designed to both protect & soothe skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works extremely well, but be careful of dark clothing
reviews.reviewText: Got this for use when I wear skirts or shorts because of the dreaded chafing. It worked for its purpose throughout an entire 3-4 hours of sweating and walking through the ren Faire in a skirt. It does get on dark clothing so be careful.Pros: works fantastic, even survived sweaty walking for hours, cheap, easy to apply, doesn't feel sticky and don't really feel it after rubbing it in, doesn't have too much of a strong scentCons: the only REAL con I had was that just touching black clothing after applying when I thought it was mostly off my hands caused it to get white all over the black clothing (very much like powder Deodorant does) [the good news is the white stains came out in the wash and didn't stain permanently or bleach anything], if you don't want ANY scent this isn't for you, the scent isn't strong, but there is one.This product makes it possible for my to comfortably wear skirts again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: This project is hand down at ten out of five!!! I have very sensitive skin and this chafing cream keeps me from getting raw in the summer between my thighs and the crease of my leg!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very good
reviews.reviewText: Keeps your balls and crack from smelling like balls and crack. No over powering perfume, keeps you dry. Found it better to let the product dry a few minutes before getting dressed. Got mine on sale, but the price is getting higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a labour intensive job and I used the chafe after almost every night of work. It really slowed me down so I did research and bought some slip shorts to where under my pants. They worked just fine but they were uncomfortable and hot because of the weather here. When I got this I lathered on a decent layer on my inner thighs and every since then I haven't chafed. You will definitely have to reapply after a good amount of hours. I start work at 8:30 am and end at about 4 pm after then I definitely have to reapply if I'm working that evening. So perfect and I love it!

reviews.reviewerName: Absolutely loved the quality in the pictures. Very clear & sharp. Could not tell I pulled them off my phone or that they were taken by a cell phone
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: I thought this product was supposed to turn to a powdery texture after it dries. However that is not the case. It actually made me chafe. No I have a nasty wound on the groin area on each side and it’s very painful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I like hylands brand, I normally buy a different product this did not go on easily, never turned to a powder finish as advertised, greatly disappointed, asked customer service to refund

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I spend my life in a wheelchair; the cream to powder give great relief and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice smell and smooth formula
reviews.reviewText: This applies to skin very smoothly, it's great for chub rub on your thighs or for protecting the skin under your bra underwire (although it will gunk up the bra a little bit).It smells pleasant and is easy to use!
